title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.9 - Leaves of absence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.9 - Leaves of absence

State Regulations

The recipient of an academic performance award may be
granted a leave of absence by the Higher Education Services Corporation, prior
to the receipt and utilization of the first award payment, for the following
reasons: (a) illness; (b) financial circumstances; (c) active service in the Armed Forces of the

United States; (d) service in the
national welfare in a program such as the Peace Corps; or
(e) such other reasons as may be approved by
the commissioner upon application by the award recipient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
